Given that typically indices start at 1 for arrays or matrices represented visually aligned horizontally, vertically, or diagonally - assign:
- Row labels / Middle diagonal label / Colummn headers match the alphabetical character representations indicating location ('top', 'left', 'right') – \(\text{Top} = u\), \(\text{Middle}\text{diagonal}=a\), \(\text{Bottom}=d\).
- Individual items inside squares correspond respectively to '\(n\)' positions away going clockwise around the square centered at `Center`.
